slides.title: Introducing PulseSync
slides.body: The AI-powered team calendar that thinks ahead.
slides.image_prompt: Sleek, modern calendar UI with subtle AI visualization elements, professional and clean design

slides.title: Smart Scheduling
slides.body:
• Automatically finds optimal meeting times
• Learns team preferences and patterns
• Reduces scheduling conflicts by 87%
slides.image_prompt: Split screen showing chaotic calendar vs. organized PulseSync calendar with AI suggesting optimal times

slides.title: Team Insights
slides.body:
• Analyzes meeting effectiveness
• Suggests focus time protection
• Provides team availability forecasting
slides.image_prompt: Dashboard with meeting analytics and team availability heat map

slides.title: Seamless Integration
slides.body:
• Works with existing tools (Slack, Teams, etc.)
• No manual data entry
• Available on all devices
slides.image_prompt: Multiple devices showing PulseSync connected to various common workplace tools

slides.title: Start Optimizing Your Team's Time Today
slides.body:
Launch offer: $9/user/month
Free 30-day trial
Enterprise plans available

www.pulsesync.ai
